ai_note.description: Detailed analysis of session activities, comparing actual queries against stated purpose and intended queries. Highlights any policy violations, data misuse, or anomalies detected.

session_activity_risk.description: Risk rating based on the actual queries executed during the session, focusing on policy violations and security concerns.

deviation_risk.description: Risk rating based on how well the executed queries align with the original request's stated purpose and intended queries.

overall_risk.description: Overall risk rating combining session activity risk and deviation risk.

flags.description: List of specific violations or concerns identified during the session review.

human_audit_confidence.description: Human audit confidence score (0-100) indicating how much human review is needed. Higher scores = more human audit needed. Scores â‰¥ 70 trigger human audit.

human_audit_required.description: Whether this session requires human audit based on confidence score and risk factors.
